faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I upgrade from the free plan?
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade anytime from the settings page.
faq.q2: Is there a discount for yearly billing?
faq.a2: Yes, yearly billing saves you about 17%.
faq.q3: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
faq.a3: You can continue using the service until the end of your billing period. After that, you'll be switched to the free plan.
faq.q4: How do I purchase the Enterprise plan?
faq.a4: You can subscribe online or contact our sales team for the Enterprise plan.
